commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
name: Backend Docker CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [main] # 你要觸發的 branch

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Docker Buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3

      - name: Build backend Docker image
        working-directory: ./server # 重點：你的 Dockerfile / compose 在 server 下面
        run: |
          docker build -t im-backend:latest .
